metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13005 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in MP4Box in GPAC 0.7.1. The function urn_Read inisomedia/box_code_base.c has a heap-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13005` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
gpac-modules-base - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
libgpac4 - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1').
